poemsDataJson.list_full: 淡路島(あはぢしま) かよふ千鳥(ちどり)の 鳴(な)く声(こゑ)に いく夜(よ)寝覚(ねざ)めぬ 須磨(すま)の関守(せきもり)
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: Guard of Suma Gate,//From your sleep, how many nights//Have you awakened//At the cries of sanderlings,//Flying from Awaji Island?
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Awaji-shima|Kayou chidori no|Naku koe ni|Ikuyo nezamenu|Suma no seki-mori
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: いくよねさめぬ すまのせきもり
poemsDataJson.author: 源兼昌(みなもとのかねまさ)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 須磨の千鳥の声によってもよおされた旅の哀感
